reviews.customers_say: Customers find the sweater fits perfectly and has good quality. However, the appearance receives mixed feedback.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Becky said
items.body: Great Quality and so stylish! Love the color combination. I got the grey. I bought the recommended size of large. I was nervous about the fit as I have an apron belly but it fit perfectly. It is machine wash and hang dry. It dries well and the collar doesn’t need ironing. Would highly recommend Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful details but long and loose.
items.body: This sweater is stunning!! It's soft, luxurious and the denim detail and gold buttons are adorable. I am 5'7", 135lbs and the small fits nicely but it is a very loose small, and long. It's stretchy and so comfortable to wear, I just wish it wasn't soooo long. I use a stretchy belt/tuck thing under my shirts to tuck in the long hem and it's a bit bunchy, but I love the sweater so much that I'll make it work. Just don't order a size up, because you'll be swimming in it. It's is thick without seeming too hot or stuffy, but will keep you warm! Read more
items.author: R. F 1117

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Looks expensive but it isn’t. Lots of compliments
items.body: Loved this sweater. Fits well. Not too heavy. Looks great with jeans Read more
items.author: June Weiss

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Pretty, but there are some construction problems!
items.body: This sweater is pretty, but it's not very well put together. It's intended to look like a sweater over the top of a denim shirt, but the woven fabric of the sweater is super soft and flexible (that's good), and the denim of the collar is stiff and heavy, so it drags down on the sweater fabric and just kind of hangs funny. The two gold buttons are extremely cheap and look cheap, and they were also sewn on very poorly. Both of them were done up when the sweater arrived, but that made me look like a grandma, and when I unbuttoned them, the thread was so long on each button that they visibly dangled down. They don't add much to the sweater, so I will likely end up just cutting them off. I haven't I washed this sweater yet (which I like to do at least once prior to writing a review), but I can already say that I'm concerned about the washability. I'm personally going to hand wash in cold water and hang to dry. With all this being said, the sweater itself (minus the collar) is warm and soft, and the blue is a very deep and beautiful color. With a bit of starch on the collar it might look a bit better (who knows), and I do plan to keep the sweater and wear it occasionally. Do I recommend it? In this case I just don't know. I might encourage you to spend the money on something with better construction and quality buttons, but if this style is perfect for you, the sweater isn't bad. Read more
items.author: Gingerbread

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars NICE QUALITY
items.body: This sweater is so beautiful. I ordered a Medium and it fits nice. Its soft and lightweight, perfect with jeans, slacks or skirts. I actually ordered 2. You want be disappointed. Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 2.0 out of 5 stars Not as pictured
items.body: Does not look like picture. Stitching is not white, it's orange. Collar is larger than it appears in picture. Read more
items.author: MJ

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very classy looking!
items.body: Wow! This sweater is really good looking and well made! Got lots of compliments on it! Did not shrink when washed! True to size Read more
items.author: Katie Green

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Sleeves and length a little long but it has a nice feel to the material
items.body: Runs a little large. I bought this sweater for my wife and she loves the quality of the material as well as the feel. She normally is in-between a medium or large. We went with the large, and we might have been able to get away with the medium. Either way she is happy with the sweater, which in turn makes me happy with the sweater! Read more
items.author: MJG

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress V Neck Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress V Neck Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: One Size.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: 249#jwhite, 249#navy, 249#darkred, 249#khaki, 249#grey, 249#red, 249#coffee. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: One Size.
